member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Charts.SfSparkline`1
member.summary: The Sparkline Charts is a replacement for normal charts to display trends in a very small area. Customize sparklines completely by changing the series or axis type and by adding markers, data labels, range bands, and more.
member.typeparam: Represents the generic data type of the sparkline control.
